coreAttributes.name: Black Stripes Perry
coreAttributes.description: A glass bottle containing pear cider, known more commonly as 'perry'. A stylised image of a badger's face is displayed upon the bottle's neck, while the label declares it to be of the brand 'Black Stripes'.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.05)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off the bottle of perry, before tilting [npc.her] head back and gulping down the golden liquid. Quickly finishing off the entire bottle, [npc.name] [npc.verb(notice)] a faint, musky dryness permeating through the sweet liquid, which lingers for some time as a slightly unpleasant aftertaste.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] the cap off the bottle of perry, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and making [npc2.herHim] gulp down the golden liquid. Quickly finishing off the entire bottle, [npc2.name] [npc2.verb(notice)] a faint, musky dryness permeating through the sweet liquid, which lingers for some time as a slightly unpleasant aftertaste.
